info.name: Al-Hamra Brokerage API v2
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for the Al-Hamra Brokerage Management System API. Covers authentication, catalog (categories, products, services), sales operations, stock management, reporting and document uploads for the v2 REST interface.

Version 2 highlights new installment CRUD endpoints for managing payment schedules.

exec: console.warn("Unable to parse login response", e);

query.description: Comma separated relations (products, services)

request.description: Retrieve the wallet balance for the authenticated agent. Admins can pass an `agent_id` query parameter to inspect a specific agent.
List commissions for the authenticated agent. Supports optional filters: `status[]`, `from_date`, `to_date`, and `agent_id` (admin only).

query.description: Filter customers by name or email

request.description: Admins receive the full customer list. Agents and branch admins only see the customers they created or customers linked to their branch.

request.description: Creates a customer record with the extended profile fields. Creator metadata is stored automatically based on the authenticated user.
Returns the full customer profile including creator metadata (`added_by_role`, `added_by_branch_id`, `added_by_agent_id`).
Branch, agent and marketing executive context is now derived automatically from the customer's stored sourcing information.
Create a service sales order; pricing is taken from the service and down_payment/installments are not required.

Record a payment against a sales order. Development commissions now remain in a pending state until the month-end processing job runs (php artisan commissions:process), so no commission records are created at payment time.

Retrieve paginated payment history with flexible filters across customer, agent, branch and sales order metadata. Enable the optional export or print flags to download CSV output or consume a print-friendly JSON payload.

item.name: Installments
item.description: CRUD endpoints for managing customer installments.

request.description: Summarize commission totals with gap logic distribution. The response separates paid amounts from pending potential commissions calculated from payments that have not yet been processed.
Detailed commission ledger including agent, employee and branch filters. Use export=excel for CSV downloads or print=1 for a print-friendly payload.
Comprehensive sales order report with customer, agent and branch context. Supports CSV export and print-friendly formats.
Aggregated employee sales performance including order counts, sales totals and collection ratios. Supports filtering by branch, sales type, and date range while allowing sort by any metric.
Current stock position with category filters and CSV/print options for offline analysis.
Ledger view of income accounts. Apply account filters or export results for financial reconciliation.
Customer-specific ledger with running balance. Requires a valid customer_id.
Supplier ledger driven by entries tagged with supplier meta information.
Account-specific statement view supporting either account_id or account_code filters.

query.description: Filter by rank code
Filter customers for a specific employee (requires admin or manager role).
Search by customer name, email, or phone number.
Results per page (defaults to 15).
Filter sales orders for a specific employee (requires admin or manager role).
Filter by sales order status (repeat the parameter to pass multiple statuses).
Filter sales created on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Filter sales created on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Results per page (defaults to 15).
Filter commissions for a specific employee (requires admin or manager role).
Filter by commission status (repeat the parameter to pass multiple statuses).
Filter commissions created on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Filter commissions created on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Results per page (defaults to 15).
View the wallet for a specific employee (requires admin or manager role).

request.description: Retrieve the current wallet balance for the authenticated employee. Administrators can supply an employee_id to inspect another employee's wallet.

query.description: Optional month (YYYY-MM) to view a specific incentive period.
Filter activities for a specific employee (requires admin or manager role).
Filter activities on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Filter activities on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).
Results per page (defaults to 15).
Filter by employee rank (ME, MM, DGM, GM, PD, ED, DMD, HD)

request.description: Fetch service commissions for an employee with status and calculated amounts.
Run month-end processing for draft service commissions to mark them paid and credit wallets.
